text: 384 Tower Hamlets Local Plan BACK TO POLICIES of a complete planning application. This SPD can be used to inform formulation of a waste management plan as required under part 3 of Policy RW3 â€“ Waste collection facilities in new development. 20.53 In instances where it is not practicable or we consider it inappropriate for non-traditional waste collection systems to be incorporated within the development, the developer or managing agent must provide adequate space as well as collection containers that are in accordance with the requirements set out in the Tower Hamlets Reuse, Recycling and Waste SPD.
